intro: Liam kicks the clock out of time! Along with a talking frog and a magic clock, he must find lost crystals in a world of crazy days and incredible creatures… before chaos catches up with him!
description:
The days of the week blur together, the past, present, and future become confused, and strange creatures appear everywhere. 

With the help of a talking frog and a slightly grumpy magic clock, Liam must find the lost time crystals to restore order… before a mysterious villain stops him! 

An adventure full of humor, color, and surprises that little ones will love.

Highlights:

·A fun and wacky story where each day of the week is a different surprise.

·Fascinating and unique characters, from wise frogs to Monday creatures with sunglasses.

·Super colorful backgrounds that change with each day, full of details and visual magic.

·Upbeat and friendly music, perfect for accompanying little ones on this adventure.

·A visual novel designed for little ones, with charming illustrations and accessible narrative.

·Easy time travel, with lots of humor and unexpected moments.
